name: YOUR LITTLE SISTER GOES TRICK-OR-TREATING ALONE?!
name_original: YOUR LITTLE SISTER GOES TRICK-OR-TREATING ALONE?!
description:
"Aggy-chan goes trick-or-treating, too bad she didn't notice it's already November because she's a bit retarded. Sadly the residents won't give her any treats."

(Shitpost project made in a couple of hours, mostly unfinished. Don't play.)

-Press "Esc" to quit.
